price: Kur u erdhi e Vërteta prej Nesh, ata thanë: “Kjo duket që është magji e qartë!”
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu min ʿindinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥ'run mubīnun
